entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell flyout items are displayed multiple times - if async added by code #12233
  • ERROR -cannot execute app.dll the selected execution mode is not supported for .net projects #12231
  • Label control with TextType set to Html not able to change FontFamily #12230
    Backlog
  • Building in Release mode for Android results in a "The selected execution mode is not supported for .NET projects." error #12226
  • SetPadding for Entry does not work in .NET 7/MAUI 7 in Android #12224
    Backlog
  • NotifyCanExecuteChanged event doesn't set correct button color on Windows #12222
    Backlog
  • CollectionView unusable on iPhone 14 Pro and iPhone 14 Pro Max #12221
    Backlog

Closed

  • Frame does not render border correctly while corner radius specified on windows platform #11990
  • [xamlc] Try to remove `[LoadInSeparateAppDomain]` #11885
    .NET 8 Planning
  • How to open maui project directly on Maximized window? #12223
  • Building in Release mode for iOS results in a "The application has not been built" error #12225

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] remove Xamarin.AndroidX.Legacy.Support.V4 #12232
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️

Merged

  • [net7.0] Only add PointerGesture if PointerOver VisualState exists #12155
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [xamlc] remove `LoadInSeparateAppDomain` and `static` state #11982
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, 8.0-preview1
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.4.0 to 17.4.1 #12169
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add BlazorWebView binaries to xmldocs artifacts #12215
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Add a null-guard in MenuItem to prevent NRE #12207
    t/bug, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Micro benchmark fixes #12178
    community ✨
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Android] Fix Frame Renderer to use Wrapper View correctly #12218
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
